text: 10:19 Ua Me Ini 20:12-16; Godɨn Araziba 5:16-20; 24:14; Jems 5:4Nɨ God Moses ganɨngizir arazim gɨfo, ‘Nɨ gumazim mɨsueghtɨ an aremeghan markɨ, nɨ poroghamiba uari bakeir arazim damuam markɨ, nɨ gumazamizir igharazibar biziba okɨman markɨ, nɨ bizibagh ifaran markɨ, nɨ ua bagh biziba inisɨ gumazamizibagh ifaran markɨ, nɨ uan afeziam ko amebamɨn apengan ikɨ aningɨn akaba baragh.’ ”
